column5: Bought his crucial rods that were for sale in the classifieds. He even came out to my side of the city to meet up with me. Came on time(well.. actually 10 minutes early, but that's good!) Also got some lures too from him. Great stuff, great price, from a great guy! I can't wait to use the stuff!!  Was nice meeting you, Dave. Take care,   Kevin  :Gonefishing:
Kevin  I hope you enjoy the rods,  When you wantto upgrage your reels let meknoe.. I have a Stradics a and a Magenz Stradic 4 sale as well  Dave
Always nice when a deal comes together, and good luck with the new gear Kevin.
great guy this dave is, have fun with ur new gear
